Первая часть однозначно хороша. Но эта игра... она подняла за собой огромный фандом который наверное никогда не умрёт... Знаменитые игры такие как Portal и Gmod никогда бы не существовали без этой чудесной игры. Правда сейчас тупо обидно что в место того чтобы выпускать новые игры можно просто устроить ивент в долбаной ДОТЕ. И это печально. Однако фанаты ждут з части и когда нибудь это случится.

Half life 2 is one of my favorite games. The reason why i loved half life 2 was its story line and its gameplay. I will not retell the story line itself, but I will explain some of the parts in it that I loved. The first part that i loved about the game was it's synking with the first game. In the actual start of the game, you can already see your well known friend Barney who was a security guard in the first place. Then, you can see Doctor Kliener which was also one of the scientists in black mesa research facility. The next part that i want to talk about is graphics. For 2004, i can say it's beautiful. Even now there are tons of shooters coming out and there are many of them that look much worse then half life 2. About the gameplay itself i will also say a few words. The gameplay is really cool. You're being chased by the combine empire while seeing some of the well known xen alien creatures and just trying to survive. Last thing i will say about the game is Physics. Half life 2 physics are great and not all of the newest games can boast the same. The game has great physics but the only strange thing is that, when the burning barrel falls into the water, it's not stopping to burn. That's all i can pretty much say about this wonderful game. I'm not going to talk about many story line parts just because i don't want to make spoilers for the game. If you'll ask me: Should i buy this game? Answer is: Obviously yes. It's incredibly great for a 2 hour shooter.

La verdad este juego trascendio en los años como un juego de culto, yo a mi corta edad lo conocia pero solo de nombre. Pero ahora que le doy una oportunidad me doy cuenta de lo gran juego que es y porque es uno de los mas reconocidos. gordo gordo gordo gordo gordo, gordo alpargata, gordo cabeza de termo, sos tan gordo que tu vieja no te dice hijo te dice gordo.
